declarations.comments: Ethereum signature used for signing / verification
declarations.title: Signature

declarations.comments: Returns Keccak-256 (not the standardized SHA3-256) of the given data
declarations.title: keccak256

declarations.comments: If client is actively listening for network connections
declarations.title: netListening

declarations.comments: Number of peers currently connected to the client
declarations.title: netPeerCount

declarations.comments: If client is actively mining new blocks
declarations.title: ethMining

declarations.comments: Number of hashes per second that the node is mining with
declarations.title: ethHashrate

declarations.comments: Current price per gas in WEI
declarations.title: ethGasPrice

declarations.comments: List of addresses owned by client
declarations.title: ethAccounts

declarations.comments: Balance of the account of given address
declarations.title: ethGetBalance

declarations.comments: Value from a storage position at a given address
declarations.title: ethGetStorageAt

declarations.comments: Number of transactions sent from an address
declarations.title: ethGetTransactionCount

declarations.comments: Number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash
declarations.title: ethGetBlockTransactionCountByHash

declarations.comments: Number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block number
declarations.title: ethGetBlockTransactionCountByNumber

declarations.comments: Number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash
declarations.title: ethGetUncleCountByBlockHash

declarations.comments: Number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block number
declarations.title: ethGetUncleCountByBlockNumber
